name: The Fuck it Let's Jam Adventure to a Pleasant Future... In Space
name_original: The Fuck it Let's Jam Adventure to a Pleasant Future... In Space
description:
A super-rough prototype of a game in which two players each control one side of a spaceship, and have to navigate their way to a wormhole, in search of a pleasant future.

Credits:

Art & Design:

Samuel Alves & Giovanna Mateus

Shoddy Programming:

Jack Lowther & Andrew Scally

/*CONTROLS

//XBOX Controller input only

A - shoot (Might work, download to find out ;) ;;)):))

B - activate shield

X - strafe

LB - Thrust forward

RB - Thrust backward
